shortDescription: BattleMechs are wreaking havoc on the general population. We have DropShips en route to evacuate as many refugees as they can carry, but the aggressors will target them if they get the chance. I need you to deny them that opportunity.
longDescription: We can't let the aggressors get away with what they're doing here, Commander. Punish them for it.

contractObjectiveList.title: At least two DropShips must survive
Protect the docking pads' fuel reservoirs

objectiveList.title: Shepard Three Inbound to Pad Charlie
Shepard Two Inbound to Pad Bravo
Hidden Ship One Arrival Message Timer
Defend the Fuel Tank at Pad Alpha
Defend the Fuel Tank at Pad Bravo
Defend the Fuel Tank at Pad Charlie

dialogueContent.words: The spaceport in front of you is packed wall-to-wall with civilians, most of them refugees from the capital. The Agressors have been targeting them as enemy combatants. I need your help to keep those people safe until we can evac them to safety.
We have three of the late Lord Karosas's DropShips en route to assist with the evacuation. The captain of each vessel will call in on approach. Shepherd One will be heading for Docking Pad Alpha.
Shepherd Two is set to dock at Pad Charlie.

Shepherd Three is heading for Pad Bravo. You'll need to keep the enemy's eyes on you, and away from the docking pads. Above all, you need to keep them from firing on the docking pads' fuel reservoirs while the DropShips are being loaded.

Any hostiles that you fail to engage will almost certainly target the fuel tanks. If they manage to take one out, the resulting explosion will wipe out everything nearby—DropShips, refugees, you name it. You can see a fuel tank's estimated blast radius in red on your screen.
That's the last of them. Good job, Commander—if it wasn't for your lance, all of those refugees would have died here today.

Your mercenary fought well, Lady Arano. But know that this has only just begun. None of us can return home until you have been captured or killed. And for every Agressor 'Mech that you destroy, ten more will rise to take its place.
And we will defeat them, Commander. Just as we defeated you.
Good luck, Commander—the Agressors aren't going to make this easy. Protect our ships. Help them get our people home safe.
You have to keep those hostiles engaged! Keep the pressure on, and don't let them focus on the fuel reservoirs!
I take no pleasure in this, Lady Arano… but we're under orders. You can end this by surrendering to Commodore Ostergaard. Until you do, your people will suffer for you.
Shepherd One has arrived.
Shepherd One is away.
Shepherd Two has arrived.
Shepherd Two is away.
Shepherd Three has arrived.
Shepherd Three is away.
Shepherd One is incoming, full burn approach. Destination: Pad Alpha.
Shepherd Three is incoming, full burn approach. Destination: Pad Bravo.
Shepherd Two is incoming, full burn approach. Destination: Pad Charlie.
This is Shepherd One. Our payload is secure and we're preparing for launch!
Shepherd Two here. We've got a hold full of civvies, and we're prepping for launch.
This is Shepherd Three. We have the last of the refugees. Buy us another few minutes and we'll get out of here.
We've got enemy flankers incoming! Engage them before they take out our DropShips!
Concentrate all fire on those DropShips! Take 'em out, or you'll have Ostergaard to answer to!
More hostiles incoming! Keep their focus on you and away from those DropShips!
Advance and engage! For the Glory!
We've lost a DropShip! Protect the others, or the rest of our refugees are as good as dead!
As long as you keep attacking those hostiles, they won't be able to focus on the fuel tanks. Keep pressuring them, Commander.
